subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Freddy Adu was given permission by Real Salt Lake to travel to Portugal in an attempt to complete transfer negotiations with Benfica.Major League Soccer and Benfica have already agreed to a $2 million transfer fee for Adu, who was the captain of the United States team at this year’s FIFA Under-20 World Cup.
